snippet: Songs on themes of death by Mahler and Shostakovich made for a contemplative performance by the baritone Matthias Goerne and the pianist Leif Ove Andsnes at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by German baritone Matthias Goerne and Norwegian pianist Leif Ove Andsnes at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: Songs on themes of death by Mahler and Shostakovich made for a contemplative performance by the baritone Matthias Goerne and the pianist Leif Ove Andsnes at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Matthias Goerne and Leif Ove Andsnes at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: Considering Life’s End and What Comes After
